duties_responsibilities.duty: Configure and maintain the performance, availability, capacity, and security of servers and storage systems.
Design, install, configure, administer, and maintain operating systems, client systems, servers, and storage environments.
Participate in testing, implementation, maintenance, documentation, and development of operations and maintenance procedures.
Design, develop, and maintain data interfaces and the interface engine that manipulates the interface messages in production and non-production environments.
Perform software installations/deployments and upgrades to operating systems and multi-tiered software packages.
